text:
What's up guys! Today we're learning English with 
one of the best tv series ever, The Sopranos.

The reason why this is one of the best series of 
all time is because of the genius way that we see

Tony Soprano manage his two families. 
His actual family and his mafia family

as well as his frequent visits to his 
therapist which give great insight into

his life not only this but the acting is 
absolutely incredible by the whole cast.

In case you're new here we help you to learn 
fast English without getting lost without

missing the jokes and without subtitles just 
like Jessy who says that now she actually feels

like she is learning English so if that sounds 
good to you don't forget to hit that subscribe

button and the bell down below so that you 
don't miss a single one of our new lessons.

Listening to and understanding the New Jersey 
accent where The Sopranos is set can be quite

tricky along with all the other native English 
accents so I highly recommend our fluent with

friends course in this 48 week course you will 
learn with the first two seasons of friends

you'll receive pdf power lessons every week 
vocabulary memorization software access to

our Fluency Circle Global Community and so much 
more and did you know you can try it right now

for free with our three-part master class all 
you have to do is click up here or down in the

description box below to learn more and sign 
up now we look forward to seeing you there.

If you're enjoying this lesson then why not check 
out our lesson on another great series, Lost. You

can click up here or down in the description 
box below to learn some advanced vocabulary.
